text:
Nemir A. Kirdar (– 9 June 2020) was an Iraqi-British businessman and financier. He founded Investcorp, a global alternative investment. He was CEO for over 30 years until he stood down in 2015 to became Chairman until his retirement in 2017. He was born in Tehran.
Kirdar died at his home in Cap D’Antibes, France from dementia-related problems on 9 June 2020, aged 83.
